whodonedidit.skeletons

Class Snoop

  • java.lang.Object
    • whodonedidit.skeletons.Snoop
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Action

    public class Snoop
extends java.lang.Object
implements Action
    Represents the action that takes place after a player plays a Snoop card. You choose one random card from a certain player's hand SRS Functional Requirements: 2.4 Extension D

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int target_player
      the target player that will be snooped on

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Snoop(int target_player)
      Constructs an action that can be used by the game manager to do a Snoop on a target player.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void doAction(GameManager manager)
      Method to execute the action
      private static void doSnoop(Snoop myself, GameManager manager)
      The game manager takes one card from the target player's hand and sends it to the player who played the snoop card.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
